subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Belmont Stakes winner Rags to Riches missed another scheduled workout yesterday, this time because she did not “feel quite right” on the track at Belmont Park, her exercise rider, Lauren Robson, said. The trainer Todd Pletcher said that Rags to Riches, his star 3-year-old filly, was examined and that “she was fine.” The scheduled five-furlong breeze was cut short by Robson. Rags to Riches missed a workout last week with an elevated temperature. She was then pulled out of consideration for Saturday’s $300,000 Coaching Club American Oaks, which was won by her stablemate Octave.
